claim().details: calls updateReward(msg.sender) which updates the global state and user's reward

returns._0: The amount of USDC reward earned by the user.

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).details: Only the insuranceManager can call this; calls updateReward(address(0))

params._claimManager: The address of the ClaimManager contract
params._insuranceManager: The address of the InsuranceManager contract

stake(uint256).details: calls updateReward(msg.sender) which updates the global state and user's reward

params.amount: The amount of USDC to stake.

unstake(uint256).details: calls updateReward(msg.sender) which updates the global state and user's reward

params.amount: The amount of USDC to unstake.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of a user

claim().notice: Claims all pending rewards for the caller.

earned(address).notice: Returns the earned rewards for a specific user.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().notice: Returns the last timestamp at which rewards were applicable

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).notice: Adds rewards to be distributed over the rewards duration

rewardPerToken().notice: Returns the accumulated reward per token.

setConfig(address,address).notice: Sets the configuration for InsuranceManager and ClaimManager contracts

stake(uint256).notice: Stakes USDC and mints JagaToken to the staker.

timeLeft().notice: Returns the time left in the current reward period

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstakes USDC and burns the equivalent JagaToken.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdraw for ClaimManager to handle claim payouts
